name: Hakka Finance on xDai on BSC
description:
Hakka Finance: Decentralized Derivatives & Original Financial Instruments

Hakka Finance is a decentralized financial ecosystem with remarkable DeFi products administered by governance token: $HAKKA.

By distributing HAKKA directly into the hands of users and the community, an increasingly large ecosystem will be incentivized to upgrade the protocol and collectively lead the protocol into the future under excellent governance.
